Title: Relates to immigration enforcement
Summary: Relates to state and local law enforcement agency coordination with the federal government for purposes of immigration enforcement, to the release of noncitizen incarcerated individuals for federal immigration purposes, and to immigration enforcement in sensitive locations.
LawCode: Add Art 35 ยง847, Exec L; add ยง530, Cor L; add ยง46, Civ Rts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, the correction law and the civil rights law, in relation to immigration enforcement; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
